Pokedex.name: Pokedex
Pokedex.description: Complete product record with blockchain references and supply chain data

description.label: Description
description.description: HTML-formatted product description shown to consumers

contract.label: Contract
contract.description: Blockchain smart contract address where the NFT is minted

token.label: Token
token.description: Unique NFT token identifier on the blockchain

typesVersion.label: Types Version
typesVersion.description: Version of the schema types used

instance.label: Product Instance
instance.description: Complete supply chain data for this product

ProductInstance.name: Product Instance
ProductInstance.description: A physical product tracked through its entire supply chain journey

type.label: Product Type
type.description: The name or category of the product displayed in the supply chain tree

ownerId.label: Owner
ownerId.description: Domain or identifier of the entity that owns/produces this product

category.label: Category
category.description: Main category determining how the product is processed and displayed

expiryDate.label: Expiry Date
expiryDate.description: When the product expires, displayed in local time format

bio.label: Organic/Bio
bio.description: Whether the product is certified organic - displayed as YES/NO badge and affects carbon footprint

quantity.label: Quantity
quantity.description: Weight in grams or volume in milliliters - used for nutrient calculations

price.label: Price
price.description: Pricing information shown in the supply chain details

title.label: Title
title.description: Optional display name for the product (overrides type)

description.label: Description
description.description: Detailed product description shown to consumers

pictureURL.label: Picture URL
pictureURL.description: URL to product image displayed in the UI

FoodInstance.name: Food Instance
FoodInstance.description: A food product with nutritional data, processing history, and environmental impact tracking

iDs.label: Registry IDs
iDs.description: How this item is idenified in other systems, such as in Food Data Central or retail PLU codes

nutrients.label: Nutrients
nutrients.description: Nutritional information displayed as bar charts with RDI percentages (proteins, fats, carbs, vitamins, minerals)

format.label: Format
format.description: How the food is prepared or packaged - shown in supply chain tree

grade.label: Grade
grade.description: Quality classification displayed with grade icon

size.label: Size
size.description: Size classification of individual items (not quantity)

packaging.label: Packaging
packaging.description: Type of packaging used for the product

process.label: Process
process.description: The production/handling process that created this product - displayed as expandable tree node with icon (harvest, milling, freeze-drying, blending, printing, sale)

CartridgeInstance.name: Cartridge Instance
CartridgeInstance.description: A 3D printing cartridge used in food production

size.label: Size
size.description: Physical size classification of the cartridge

NonFoodInstance.name: Non-Food Instance
NonFoodInstance.description: General purpose product instance (e.g. tools, equipment, etc.)

InputInstance.name: Input Instance
InputInstance.description: A product used as an ingredient or material in a production process

instance.label: Product
instance.description: Reference to the product being used - can be a token ID or full product data

quantity.label: Quantity
quantity.description: Amount of this ingredient used in grams or milliliters

type.label: Input Type
type.description: Whether the input comes from the same location (local) or was transported

transport.label: Shipping
transport.description: Transportation details showing method, fuel type, duration, and carbon impact

LocalInputInstance.name: Local Input
LocalInputInstance.description: An ingredient sourced from the same facility - no transportation required

TransportedInputInstance.name: Transported Input
TransportedInputInstance.description: An ingredient that was shipped to the production facility

type.label: Type
type.description: Always "transported" - triggers display of shipping details

transport.label: Transport
transport.description: Shipping information displayed in tree with vehicle icon

Transport.name: Transport
Transport.description: Shipping details for moving products between facilities - impacts carbon footprint

method.label: Shipping Method
method.description: Mode of transportation - displayed with corresponding icon (plane/truck/boat)

fuelType.label: Fuel Type
fuelType.description: Energy source used - affects environmental impact calculation

weight.label: Share
weight.description: Percentage (0-1) of vehicle capacity used by this product - shown as "Share: X%"

deparetureTime.label: Departure Time
deparetureTime.description: When the shipment left - displayed with clock icon in local datetime format

duration.label: Duration
duration.description: How long the transport took in seconds - shown in human-readable format (e.g., "2 hours 30 minutes")

Process.name: Process
Process.description: A production or handling step in the supply chain - displayed as expandable tree nodes with specific icons

timestamp.label: Time
timestamp.description: When the process occurred - displayed with clock icon in local datetime format

duration.label: Duration
duration.description: How long the process took in seconds - shown as human-readable (e.g., "45 minutes")

facility.label: Facility
facility.description: The location where processing occurred - shown with factory icon and GPS coordinates on map

temperatureRange.label: Temperature Range
temperatureRange.description: Min and max temperature during processing in Celsius - displayed with thermostat icon

inputInstances.label: Inputs
inputInstances.description: Ingredients or materials used - each shown as tree branch with transport info if shipped

impacts.label: Environmental Impacts
impacts.description: Carbon and water footprint - summed across supply chain and shown in impact badges

price.label: Price
price.description: Cost of this processing step or sale price to customer

machineInstance.label: Machine
machineInstance.description: Equipment used for processing - shown with settings icon

knowHow.label: Know-How
knowHow.description: Recipe or process instructions - shown with numbered list icon

shape.label: Shape
shape.description: 3D model URL for printing processes - shown with interests icon

PrintingProcess.name: 3D Printing
PrintingProcess.description: Additive manufacturing process creating food from cartridges

shape.label: Shape URL
shape.description: Link to 3D model file used for printing

MillingProcess.name: Milling
MillingProcess.description: Grinding or crushing process (e.g., wheat to flour)

FreezeDryingProcess.name: Freeze-Drying
FreezeDryingProcess.description: Lyophilization process removing moisture while preserving nutrients

SaleProcess.name: Sale
SaleProcess.description: Final sale to consumer - displayed with "Sold to you" label

HarvestProcess.name: Harvesting
HarvestProcess.description: Initial collection of raw agricultural products

LabelTaggerProcess.name: Label Tagger
LabelTaggerProcess.description: Applies labels or tags to products or packaging

Facility.name: Facility
Facility.description: A physical location where processing occurs - shown on interactive map

label.label: Name
label.description: Human-readable facility name (defaults to "Unnamed Facility" if omitted)

location.label: GPS Location
location.description: Geographic coordinates displayed as marker on satellite map and in tree as [longitude, latitude]

Price.name: Price
Price.description: Financial information displayed with currency symbol in tree

type.label: Price Type
type.description: Payment structure or timing - affects how price is displayed and calculated

TemperatureRange.name: Temperature Range
TemperatureRange.description: Temperature bounds during processing - displayed with thermostat icon

min.label: Minimum
min.description: Lowest temperature in Celsius during the process

max.label: Maximum
max.description: Highest temperature in Celsius during the process

MachineInstance.name: Machine
MachineInstance.description: Equipment used in production processes - displayed with settings icon

ownerId.label: Owner
ownerId.description: Who owns the equipment - shown with copyright icon

quantity.label: Quantity
quantity.description: Number of machines used or production capacity

hr.label: Tasks
hr.description: Human resources - who operated the machine

tasks.label: Tasks
tasks.description: Description of work performed by the operator

assignee.label: Assignee
assignee.description: Name or ID of person assigned - shown with person icon

KnowHow.name: Know-How
KnowHow.description: Recipe or process instructions - displayed with numbered list icon

owner.label: Owner
owner.description: Who owns the intellectual property - shown with copyright icon

hash.label: Hash
hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the recipe for verification and IP protection

outputs.label: Outputs
outputs.description: Description of what the process produces

logoURL.label: Logo URL
logoURL.description: Link to brand or recipe logo image

Impact.name: Environmental Impact
Impact.description: Ecological footprint metrics - summed across supply chain and shown in badges

format.label: Format
format.description: How the impact is measured or categorized

quantity.label: Quantity
quantity.description: Amount of impact: kg for carbon (CO2e), liters for water

CarbonImpact.name: Carbon Footprint
CarbonImpact.description: CO2 equivalent emissions - displayed as "X kg CO2e CARBON FOOTPRINT"

WaterImpact.name: Water Footprint
WaterImpact.description: Water usage - displayed as "X l WATER FOOTPRINT"

ID.name: Registry ID
ID.description: Regulatory or certification identifiers - shown with fingerprint icon

registry.label: Registry Name
registry.description: The system or authority issuing the ID

FallbackFoodNutrient.name: Nutrient Value
FallbackFoodNutrient.description: Nutritional content per 100g - displayed as bar charts with RDI percentages

amount.label: Amount
amount.description: Quantity of nutrient per 100g of product

iD.label: Nutrient ID
iD.description: Reference to USDA FoodData Central nutrient definition

Location.name: Location
Location.description: GeoJSON Point with GPS coordinates - displayed on interactive satellite map

coordinates.label: Coordinates
coordinates.description: Array of [longitude, latitude] in decimal degrees
